notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Y.Z. was responsible for the theoretical work and performed the experiments. Y.Q. and H.W. provided the experimental environment and equipment. B.D. and Q.Y. revised the paper. The authors would like to thank the assistance of Institute of Electronics, Chinese Academy of Sciences and Microsystem and Terahertz Research Center, China Academy of Engineering Physics in establishing the experimental system. The authors also wish to extend their sincere thanks to editors and reviewers for their careful reading and fruitful suggestions.
